ApproxsimClient.timeline
Class ActivityAdapter

java.lang.Object
  ApproxsimClient.timeline.ActivityAdapter
All Implemented Interfaces:
EventListener, ApproxsimObjectAdapter, ApproxsimEventListener
public class ActivityAdapter
extends Object
implements ApproxsimObjectAdapter, ApproxsimEventListener

This adapter is used to adapt ApproxsimObject of type activity for visualizing in the timeline.

getArrowIcon

public Icon getArrowIcon(SymbolIDCode code,
                         Image src,
                         Hashtable imageList)
Returns the icons of the left and the right arrows. OBS. Potential memory leak - there is a risk that the keys and weak references in imageList list are not collected by the garbage collector.

Parameters:
code - the id code of the activity resource.
src - the dafault image of activity.
imageList - the list of arrow images.
